SENTENCE.STRING: ([Hungarian: Tengerszem-cs√∫cs], [German: Meeraugspitze]) is a mountain in the crest of the High Tatras, at the Polish-Slovak border.
has three peaks: middle (2,503 m), north-western (2,499 m) and south-eastern (2,473 m).
The north-western peak is the highest point (and the most prominent) of Poland, while the highest of the three peaks is just on the Slovak side of the border.
